title: aphex twin project
desc: I was tasked to output data from a JSON file through a web application, using React. I decided to make a visualization depicting four of my favorite Aphex Twin albums, along with the tracklist/description of the chosen album, along with playable tracks.

title: landing page
desc: As a personal project, I took it upon myself to create a landing page that followed the layout of CMS's, such as Carrd.co or LinkTree, that allow you to create simple landing pages using premade HTML and CSS components. Though it's simple, I plan to add more to it in the future.

title: portfolio page
desc: You're here right now! I decided to create this page as a central source that displays all my Front-End endeavors. I made this site using React, as well as React-Router.
